short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save and retrieve valuable nuggets of information while browsing the web.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily save and retrieve valuable nuggets of information while browsing the web. Valuable for someone who generally spend a lot of their time reading and gathering information. Please stay tuned for more features to make it your personal knowledge keeper
